content.rendered:
Voltendorf Airport in Voltendorf, Austria Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address : operator Flugplatz Voltendorf and Spitzerberg GmbH
Nonntaler Hauptstrabe 36
5020 Salzburg

Phone :027 42/88 32 10

Email id: NA

Hours: Summer operating time: 9.00 am to ECET An operations manager is present on Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays during the flying season (approx. From March 1st to October 31st). BL on-call service on weekdays (stand-by service).

Voltendorf Airport Official website: https://www.voeltendorf.at/

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: NA

ICAO code: LOAD

Services at Voltendorf Airport

  • Aviation Club
  • Gliders
  • Motor gliders
  • Powered aircraft
  • Helicopters
  • Ultralights
  • Balloons

List of Airports in Austria

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Voltendorf Airport in Voltendorf, Austria Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Voltendorf Airport in Voltendorf Austria: (click on the stars below)

Updated on 20/05/21
